review: I was attracted to the Amazon Fire TV after I received a promotional email about the Fire Stick. After reading the reviews about the ease of the voice control on the Fire TV, I opted to try it. It is incredibly user-friendly and is so much better than scrolling through the alphabet to spell out requests. We have a vacation home too and the compact size of the device will be easy to take from place to place. We have only viewed a couple of documentaries but the reception so far has been perfect. Highly recommend.

review: Like it so far, pretty good with Slingtv. The audio over Bluetooth is a nice and better than the wired one on the roku remote. The one knock is integration with Amazon content. My wife has a fire phone and saves pictures to the cloud. The prime account on the fire TV is associated with her account. She was  not pleased to see all her phone pics available ( sans passcode) to be played by anyone with the fire TV remote.I'm all for pushing amazon content to all devices IF one wants to but you should have the option to not push it to certain devices. I spoke to Amazon about this they said it should be an option but it's not an option now and who knows if they will implement it or not.Apparently, the persistent "It's out of stock we don't know when, or if, it will be restocked is consistent with a new device being release.
